text: Maria Elena Bello (born April 18, 1967) is an American actress and singer. She has acted in the movies Permanent Midnight (1998), Payback (1999), Coyote Ugly (2000), The Cooler (2003), A History of Violence (2005), Thank You for Smoking (2006), and The Jane Austen Book Club (2007). In television, she acted in the medical drama ER from 1997 to 1998. She stars in NCIS. She also acted in Touch in 2013. She was born in Pennsylvania. In November 2013, Bello wrote about having a same-sex relationship with her partner Clare Munn. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1967 births Category:American movie actors Category:Living people Category:LGBT people from Pennsylvania Category:Bisexual people Category:LGBT actors Category:American television actors
title: Maria Bello
